scripts.build: npm run build-eleventy && npm run build-lambda && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: globcat src/clientside-js/*.js --output dist/site/script.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/site/script.js -- dist/site/script.js
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve-eleventy" "npm run serve-lambda" "npm run serve-css" "npm run serve-js"
scripts.serve-css: npm run build-css && node-sass --omit-source-map-url src/sass/style.scss dist/site/style.css --output-style compressed --watch
